segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling everywhere, making a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't even see it; she's too busy with her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets are getting soaked through.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, but this mess is heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that wobbly stool could fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of how things can go wrong so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is calm, but inside it's all chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the family; they'll have to clean this up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, and she hasn't reacted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a sad sight, potential disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wish someone would notice and fix it before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
